mapper.sql: id, name, price, stock, like_cnt, comment_cnt, sale_cnt, shop_id, type_id,post_date
mapper.select: select p.id, p.name, p.price, p.stock, p.like_cnt, p.comment_cnt, p.sale_cnt, p.shop_id,shop.name as shopName, p.type_id,p.post_date,p.desc from product p inner join shop on p.shop_id=shop.id where p.id=#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update product set stock=stock-#{buyCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_cnt=sale_cnt+#{buyCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id=#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and (stock-#{buyCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER})>0
mapper.select: select pr.id as id,pr.name,pr.price,pr.stock,pr.desc,pr.shop_name as shopName,pi.url from( select pro.id,pro.name,pro.price,pro.stock,pro.desc,MIN(pi.id) as img_id,shop_name from (select p.id, p.name, p.price, p.stock, p.like_cnt, p.comment_cnt, p.sale_cnt, s.name as shop_name,p.desc from product p inner join shop s on p.shop_id=s.id inner join product_type pt on p.type_id=pt.id ) as pro inner join product_image pi on pro.id = pi.product_id group by pro.id,pro.name,pro.price,pro.stock,pro.desc,pro.shop_name )as pr INNER JOIN product_image pi on pr.img_id=pi.id where pr.id=#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select pr.id as id,pr.name,pr.price,pr.stock,pr.desc,pr.shop_name as shopName,pi.url from( select pro.id,pro.name,pro.price,pro.stock,pro.desc,MIN(pi.id) as img_id,shop_name from (select p.id, p.name, p.price, p.stock, p.like_cnt, p.comment_cnt, p.sale_cnt, s.name as shop_name,p.desc from product p inner join shop s on p.shop_id=s.id inner join product_type pt on p.type_id=pt.id ) as pro inner join product_image pi on pro.id = pi.product_id group by pro.id,pro.name,pro.price,pro.stock,pro.desc,pro.shop_name )as pr INNER JOIN product_image pi on pr.img_id=pi.id where locate(#{searchKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},pr.name)>0 or locate(#{searchKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},pr.desc)>0
